subagents.name: ContextScout
subagents.description: Get accurate context FIRST before diving deep—save time, energy, and avoid rework. ContextScout intelligently discovers and retrieves the exact context files you need with precise file paths and line ranges, so you start with the right information instead of guessing. Optimized for multi-model compatibility (Claude, Gemini, GPT-4) with 20% token reduction.

subagents.name: ExternalScout
subagents.description: Fetches live, version-specific documentation for external libraries and frameworks using Context7 and other sources. Optimized with 42% token reduction and enhanced references to prompt engineering and context system docs.

subagents.name: Context Retriever
subagents.description: Generic context search and retrieval specialist for finding relevant context files, standards, and guides in any repository

subagents.name: Simple Responder
subagents.description: Test agent that responds with 'AWESOME TESTING' - for eval framework testing

subagents.name: ContextManager
subagents.description: Context organization and lifecycle management specialist - discovers, catalogs, validates, and maintains project context structure with dependency tracking

minimalCoder.name: Minimal Coder
minimalCoder.description: Minimal software development environment with code generation, testing, review, and build tools.

standardCoder.name: Standard Coder
standardCoder.description: Complete software development environment with code generation, testing, review, and build tools. Includes development principles, and design systems. Use OpenAgent for general tasks (1-4 files) or OpenCoder for complex architecture (4+ files). Recommended for most developers.

extendedCoder.name: Extended Coder
extendedCoder.description: Coding profile with everything included. All agents, subagents, tools, and plugins for maximum functionality. Includes UI/UX patterns, development principles, and design systems.

advanced.name: Advanced (Meta-Level)
advanced.description: Full installation plus System Builder for creating custom AI architectures. Includes comprehensive context system, system builder templates, and repository management tools. For power users and contributors.

simple-responder.name: Simple Responder
simple-responder.description: Test agent that responds with AWESOME TESTING
